betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oVoid miners are multiblocks that automatically generate resources at random.

The void resource miner's main use is mica, which is used in some useful recipes.

You can upgrade your resource miner to other tiers, but it's not as important, until you reach later stages in the game!

§fDo I really need this many rocks?!
Well, I can make them from nothing...
